title: Problem with pbe
body:
Good afternoon excuse me I can not create my account of the pbe could help me byfavor recently check and tell me the web that they made me but they did not let me believe what I do ??
I hope you can help me in advance thank you very much

replies.body: PBE signups are currently down for maintenance.  We currently have a [sticky ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/Q8vGhigp-442017-pbe-signup-site-issues)up regarding that, but I don't have any eta on when it will be back up.  Bookmark the [PBE status page ](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe)as we'll continue to provide updates there.  Hang tight!
